title: What It Takes to Beat the Kokopelli Trail FKT with Peter Stetina
content:
Sure, we all would love to spend more than 10 hours straight hammering the pedals across 140 agonizing miles to snag the fastest known time on one of off-road endurance cycling’s most coveted routes. What’s not to like? Lucky for those of us who can’t, or feel queasy at the very thought, pro cyclist Peter […]

author: Mark Wilson
